element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text:
This algorithm split lines in a vector layer, creating a new layer with simple segments with only two points.
Each line in the input layer is converted into n - 1 simple segments, n being the number of nodes if the original line. All those segments will have the same attributes as the layer they come from

element.name: LINES
element.text: The input layer with lines to split

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The resulting layer, containing only simple segments.
